ygData.from: "Reece Tom R CPT 25 ID L G4(n)" <g4mntofcr@...>
ygData.subject: Hobart on bard bugs
ygData.msgSnippet: Pslams of Vitality - The song works. I did not ever have an instance where I was cured and still lost HP s. I did however get the message that I was cured when
ygData.messageBody:
Pslams of Vitality - The song works. I did not ever have an instance where I
was cured and still lost HP's. I did however get the message that I was
cured when I was already cured. This should be fixed.
Solon's Bewitching Bravura - Tested on PvP and non-PVP, there is no
difference. You cannot refresh charm.
Jonthan's Provocation - Working as intended.
Song of Highsun - It was resisted. If anyone of the effects on a
mutli-effect spell are resisted, the whole song/spell is resisted. By
design.
Hobart

http://boards.station.sony.com/everquest/Forum3/HTML/002653.html


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
